channel.title: I'm Happy
channel.description:
My school is doing this program called iLearn in which all grade 7s in some middle school receive laptops!
I am <3ing them! They lots of filters and stuff. You can't save setting or install programs but at least I get a free(Mostly paid 48$ for backpack and 25$ for insurance) $1400 laptop! :)
I have mine loaded up with music!
Some Specs: Intel Centrino Duo Processors @ 1.66ghz 128mb video card 1 hard drive partitioned into 3. 2 you can't save or edit anything on, probably the OS. 1 Is a 30gb partition for My Documents, The only place I can save! Macromedia Pack: Flash 8, Dreamweaver, and others. Microsoft Office 2003 Microsoft Student (2005?) iTunes DVD-ROM/CD-RW drive
Yup, I am HAPPY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.description:
@Cheatest wrote:

jme_009:

My school was built in the twenties, and hasn’t been fixed up or anything. It’s in horrible condition.

L0L when my sister was in school… the hurricanes hit and there was mold everywhere in lockers on walls they had to close it down

item.title: I'm Happy
item.dc:creator: @Hellfish Hellfish
item.description:
@Hellfish wrote:

Is it growing mold?

My elementary school is probably 50 years old. The middle school I go to is 2-5 years old.

I will give you a hint or two, to where I go to school.
Abbreviation GMS and Rival is CNBMS or CNB.
And search the wikipedia for a list of schools in district 23 of bc.

item.dc:creator: @Cheatest Cheatest
item.description:
@Cheatest wrote:

[quote=“Thabest, post:15, topic:32983”][quote author=XxKanexX link=topic=47652.msg585720#msg585720 date=1165576215]

How? What is up with Moparisthebest’s peoples?

You act about 11.

Pretty cool, Hellfish. How many students in your year? Times that by $1400… How fricking rich is your school?

My school’s building a 5 Million dollar theater.
[/quote]

My school tore down they’re old school (built in 1942) and built a new 14 million dollar one.[/quote]

My school just finished building it 83 million dollar school a few years ago now they are putting a 2 million dollar gym\weightroom etc will full time school weekend hour athletic department workers. they are currently working on the 10 million dollar cafeteria the special section gets waitresses and chefs (students in the cooking class) which has some of the worlds top chefs as teachers.

I win?
